My Groups


Here i will display all of the users groups.

Join a group


Join a group by simply entering the groups code.
Group Code:

What is a group? If you do not want a bet to be open to every user, you can create a bet that is only avaliable to a group. You can control who is in each group by only giving the group code to people you want in the group.
